Description:
We’re introducing a new policy setting in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat that gives administrators enhanced control over how users interact with harmful content protection. This feature is designed to support specialized roles—such as legal, investigative, or moderation teams—where exposure to sensitive content may be necessary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/microsoft-365/harmful-content-protection-copilot-chat
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Harmful Content Protection Controls in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
